alert.note: Alert for Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 25 at 8:00AM EDT until August 26 at 1:13PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Black River At Elyria affecting Lorain County. For the Black River...including Elyria...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River At Elyria. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Nickle Plate Diagonal Road inundated between Parsons and Whitehead Roads north of Carlisle Township. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM EDT Friday the stage was 15.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 AM EDT Friday was 15.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 8.6 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.2 feet on 01/07/2007. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 600 PM EDT.
